code: import{Button}from"@chakra-ui/button";import{useDisclosure}from"@chakra-ui/hooks";import{ChatIcon}from"@chakra-ui/icons";import{Circle,Divider,Heading,HStack,Text,VStack}from"@chakra-ui/layout";import{Tab,TabList}from"@chakra-ui/tabs";import{useContext}from"react";import AddFriendModal from"./AddFriendModal";import{FriendContext}from"./Home";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=()=>{const{friendList}=useContext(FriendContext);const{isOpen,onOpen,onClose}=useDisclosure();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{py:"1.4rem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{justify:"space-evenly",w:"100%",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{size:"md",children:"Add Friend"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:onOpen,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatIcon,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VStack,{as:TabList,children:friendList.map(friend=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{as:Tab,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Circle,{bg:""+friend.connected==="true"?"green.700":"red.500",w:"20px",h:"20px"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:friend.username})]},"friend:".concat(friend)))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddFriendModal,{isOpen:isOpen,onClose:onClose})]});};export default Sidebar;
